SELECT ai.id, ai.attr_name, ai.catalog3_id, av.id attr_value_id , av.attr_id , av.value_name FROM base_attr_info ai INNER JOIN base_attr_value av ON ai.id=av.attr_id WHERE av.id IN (${attrValues})
